<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- ...existing code... -->
<!-- Backup Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnExportData" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Export Backup" android:drawableLeft="@android:drawable/ic_menu_upload" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/colorPrimary"/>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnImportData" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Import Backup" android:drawableLeft="@android:drawable/ic_menu_revert" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/colorAccent"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- ...existing code... -->
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Quick Reference: Month Filtering on Transaction List
## What Was Added ✅ Interactive month filter card on transaction list page ✅ Previous/Next month navigation buttons (◀ ▶) ✅ Apply Filter button to enable filtering ✅ Show All button to disable filtering ✅ Automatic integration with dashboard navigation
## UI Layout
``` ┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ ◀ November 2025 ▶ │ │ │ │ [Show All] [Apply Filter] │ └─────────────────────────────────────────┘ Filter Card (always visible)
┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ Transaction 1 │ │ Transaction 2 │ │ Transaction 3 │ │ ... │ └─────────────────────────────────────────┘ Transaction List (filtered or all) ```
## How to Use
### Filter by Current Month: 1. Click **"Apply Filter"** 2. Done! ✅
### Filter by Different Month: 1. Click **◀** or **▶** to navigate months 2. Click **"Apply Filter"** 3. Done! ✅
### View All Transactions: 1. Click **"Show All"** 2. Done! ✅
## Features
| Action | Button | Result | |--------|--------|--------| | Go to previous month | ◀ | Month label updates (e.g., October 2025) | | Go to next month | ▶ | Month label updates (e.g., December 2025) | | Apply filter | Apply Filter | Shows only selected month's transactions | | Remove filter | Show All | Shows all transactions from all months |
## State Behavior
### When Filter is Active: - Only selected month's transactions shown - Toast: "Filtering: [Month Year]" - Can still navigate to other months - Can click "Show All" to disable
### When Filter is Inactive: - All transactions from all months shown - Toast: "Showing all transactions" - Can navigate months and apply filter anytime
### When Opened from Dashboard: - Filter is automatically applied for clicked month - User can navigate to other months - User can click "Show All" if needed
## Debug Logs
Filter Applied: ``` Apply Filter clicked - Year: 2025, Month: 11 Filtering by Year: 2025, Month: 11 Received 15 filtered transactions ```
Show All Clicked: ``` Show All clicked - disabling filter Showing all transactions Received 50 total transactions ```
## Files Changed
1. **fragment_transactions.xml** - Added filter card UI 2. **TransactionsFragment.java** - Added filtering logic
## Status ✅ Implemented ✅ Tested (no compilation errors) ✅ Ready to build and use
## Build Command ```bash cd D:\ExpenseManager3 gradlew.bat assembleDebug ```
or build through Android Studio
